name: Isiah Thomas
description: 6'1" point guard, leader of the Bad Boy Pistons. Two-time champion, 12-time All-Star. Small but fearless, orchestrated the Jordan Rules, walked off court in 1991 ECF.

walking-off-court.name: Walking Off Court
walking-off-court.description: 1991 ECF - Walking off without shaking hands, ultimate disrespect
walking-off-court.expression: chin up, defiant pride, no regrets
walking-off-court.prompt: walking off basketball court with chin held high - back partially turned, not looking back, defiant pride in every step, refusing to acknowledge opponents, the infamous walkoff, smaller guard with fierce intensity

jordan-rules-signal.name: Jordan Rules Signal
jordan-rules-signal.description: Orchestrating the defensive scheme that shut down the GOAT
jordan-rules-signal.prompt: point guard signaling defensive scheme to teammates - finger pointing, directing traffic like a general, calculating eyes reading the court, small but completely in command, the mastermind orchestrating the attack

celebratory-fist-pump.name: Championship Celebration
celebratory-fist-pump.expression: triumphant joy, vindication, king of the world
celebratory-fist-pump.prompt: small guard with explosive fist pump celebration - arm raised triumphantly, face showing pure joy and vindication, championship moment, proving all doubters wrong, the little guy who conquered the league

driving-layup.name: Fearless Drive
driving-layup.description: Signature fearless drive into traffic, heart of a lion
driving-layup.expression: fearless determination, refusing to be intimidated
driving-layup.prompt: small point guard driving fearlessly into lane against bigger defenders - body contorting mid-air, eyes on the rim, no fear despite size disadvantage, attacking the basket with reckless courage, heart bigger than his frame

ice-cold-stare.name: Ice Cold Stare
ice-cold-stare.description: The intimidating look that said 'this is my court'
ice-cold-stare.prompt: point guard with ice cold intimidating stare - eyes locked on opponent, slight smirk of superiority, arms crossed or hands on hips, radiating psychological dominance despite smaller stature, the look that broke opponents mentally
